name: io.github.mcp-z/mcp-outlook
description: Outlook integration with OAuth, message search, batch operations, and calendar management
title: Outlook

environmentVariables.name: MS_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Microsoft OAuth client ID (required for OAuth authentication modes)

environmentVariables.name: MS_TENANT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Microsoft tenant ID (required for OAuth authentication)

environmentVariables.name: MS_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Microsoft OAuth client secret (optional for public clients)

environmentVariables.name: AUTH_MODE
environmentVariables.description: Authentication mode

environmentVariables.name: HEADLESS
environmentVariables.description: Disable browser auto-open, return auth URL instead (true/false)

environmentVariables.name: REDIRECT_URI
environmentVariables.description: OAuth redirect URI (optional, default: ephemeral loopback)

environmentVariables.name: STORAGE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Directory for storing CSV export files

environmentVariables.name: PORT
environmentVariables.description: HTTP server port (overrides --port)

environmentVariables.name: BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL for HTTP transport (used for OAuth/DCR endpoints and file links)

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level

packageArguments.name: --tenant-id
packageArguments.description: Microsoft tenant ID (overrides MS_TENANT_ID env var)

packageArguments.name: --headless
packageArguments.description: Disable browser auto-open, return auth URL instead

packageArguments.name: --storage-dir
packageArguments.description: Override directory for storing CSV export files

packageArguments.name: --base-url
packageArguments.description: Override base URL for HTTP transport (used for OAuth/DCR endpoints and file links)
